 Apocalypse nodded. "Yes I need to see where we stand
at this point."
--- Alloran2@... wrote:
> :::Ramjet/Vulois:::
> 
> Ramjet: yes, we have a base. It's in the place that
> will someday be called 
> Syria.  It once belonged to another faction, and
> when we found it it was 
> ruined.  But we fixed it up, and I'd be glad to show
> you it.  Would you like 
> to see?
> ~~~~~
> ::Vulois nodded reluctantly::
> Vulois: Although i'd prefer we didn't resort to
> violence, i know that you are 
> just trying to keep the peace yourselves, and will
> assist you in any way i 
> can.
> ::He fired a blast of energy at the dragon::
>
